mapper.select: select * from tbl_carmanager where c_carnum = #{carnum} order by c_sdate desc, c_stime desc LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_carmanager (c_carnum, c_qty, c_username, c_sdate, c_stime, c_skm) values (#{c_carnum}, #{c_qty}, #{c_username}, #{c_sdate}, #{c_stime}, #{c_skm})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_carmanager order by c_edate desc, c_etime desc
